Package de.fuberlin.wiwiss.ng4j.db.specific

Support for different database engines.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DbCompatibility Superclass for compatibility with different types of databases.
DerbyCompatibility Provides compatibility methods for Apache Derby databases.
HSQLCompatibility Provides compatibility methods for HSQL databases.
MySQLCompatibility Provides compatibility methods for MySQL databases.
OracleCompatibility Provides compatibility methods for Oracle databases.
PostgreSQLCompatibility Provides compatibility methods for PostgreSQL databases.
 

Package de.fuberlin.wiwiss.ng4j.db.specific Description

Support for different database engines.

The abstract class DbCompatibility defines methods which need to be implemented for each database type and provides default implementations for some of them, which should be overridden as necessary. Each of these methods are called from the QuadDB class in the parent package, de.fuberlin.wiwiss.ng4j.db.

To provide support for an additional database type it is necessary to 1. create a new subclass of DbCompatibility, and 2. edit the QuadDB class to check for the new database product name and set the database type accordingly.
